text: Tadashi kare-ra no naka, kakujitsuna konkyo no aru chishiki o motsu mono, to shinja-tachi wa, anata ni kudasa reta mono to, anata izen ni kudasa reta mono o shinji, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o shite, arrā to shūmatsu no hi o shinjiru. Korera no mono ni wa, ware wa yagate idaina hōshō o ataerudearou
